title: ICRU Report
aka: Report of the International Commission on Radiation Units and Measurements
Report of the International Commission on Radiological Units and Measurements
additional-note: Some issues of this serial have distinctive titles, and some were published in issues of Radiology or other serials.  Before concluding an issue is in the public domain, search for renewals for an issue under its distinctive title, and for copyright information on its hosting serial if applicable. We have not systematically checked issue titles for this publication. Reports first published in non-US serials may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Nat Bender for copyright research on this title.
